page.title: 04KEEPING PETS
page.content:
Some people like having pets in their house some don't.
These are some of the pets in our area cats, horses, dogs, budgies, rabbits and guinea pigs.
When my Mum last had a dog he chewed the table and chairs and they are falling to pieces we have not had a dog since.
The people in our school own 10 cats, 5 dogs,1 budgie,4 rabbits,66 ducks, 2 geese and about 29 hens.
In the country having dogs is a good idea but you can't let them roam free because of the sheep.{DO NOT}let your dog bother sheep.
